content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need HVAC service. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, George. Could you please provide the address where the HVAC service is needed?
Thanks for the address, George. Let me check if this location is within our service area.

It appears that your address is outside our usual service area. We typically cannot provide service there. However, if you still want to proceed, I can attempt to schedule an appointment. Would you like to continue?
I need to check with my spouse first before scheduling anything. Can I get back to you later?
reason: Customer needs spouse approval before scheduling
